title: "'Hot robots' may be necessary for future nuclear space missions"
excerpt: "The future of deep space exploration might depend upon what some engineers call \"hot robotics.\" These robots are designed to go places where humans cannot and may someday be called upon to carry out tasks that are far too dangerous for human crews or even other robots."
